ValidationRule.description: Prevents users who do not have the "Allow Edit of SSS Address" permission from changing the SSS address.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT($Permission.Allow_Edit_of_SSS_Address) && OR( ISCHANGED(Address__c), ISCHANGED(City__c), ISCHANGED(State__c), ISCHANGED(Zip_Code__c), ISCHANGED(Meter__c), ISCHANGED(Host_Utility_Account_Number__c), ISCHANGED(App_ID_WO_Manual__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Due to their importance, certain fields on the Shared Solar System page are restricted so that only certain people can edit them. Please contact your System Administrator to edit.
